system.description:
At 1st level, you know how to quickly turn inert chemicals into something violently reactive or useful in the moment. As a bonus action, you can create one of the following items:

  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.b0z0yz39b3qy3hdo]{Acid (vial)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.4t0m2ttaca5hg2vi]{Alchemist's fire (flask)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.yrsiymhg2jgu9vdd]{Black powder charge}

  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.5tdp8fyztsvgmk4b]{Ether (flask)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.67lx2tqow4t9aiwp]{Flash bomb}

  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.322whxi7q57yw3ww]{Oil, Flask}

  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.h8qq0ij4eokx034z]{Paint pot}

  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.31kqyuyw2vkmyd4l]{Poison, basic (vial)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.erxssofi2jlptyv7]{Smoke bomb}

  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.ukcav3i8dudpalir]{Tanglefoot bag}

  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.7tw73cwd1j8zf3g5]{Torch}

  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.dao6cj4buzfcr4b9]{Torch (alchemical)}

Items you make in this way are extremely unstable and must be used immediately. If an item you created in this way is not used (activated, lit, thrown, or applied as appropriate to the item) by the end of your next turn it dissolves into useless sludge.

You can use this feature to create a number of items equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses when you finish a short or long rest. You cannot regain expended uses in this way if you don’t have access to tools of artifice.
